subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: Randy Choate, a left-handed relief specialist for the Cardinals, pitched twice for the Yankees against the Diamondbacks in the 2001 World Series, and had an at-bat against Randy Johnson.
snippet: Randy Choate, a left-handed relief specialist for the Cardinals, pitched twice for the Yankees against the Diamondbacks in the 2001 World Series, and had an at-bat against Randy Johnson.
